## ðŸ“¦ **Package installation**

You can know open RStudio and install the `EDITH` package by running the following 
code. You can just copy-paste it into the RStudio console and hit `Enter`.

```{r}
if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) {
    install.packages("devtools")
}

if (!requireNamespace("ComplexHeatmap", quietly = TRUE)) {
    if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {
        install.packages("BiocManager")
    }
    BiocManager::install("ComplexHeatmap")
}

devtools::install_github("mathilde-robin/EDITH")
```

Once the installation is complete, you can load the package by running:

```{r}
library(EDITH)
```

ðŸŽ‰ If you don't see any error, you are now ready to use the `EDITH` package!
